headline: Lululemon’s Unrestricted Power Tests Growth Potential In Performance Training
summary: Lululemon athletica (NasdaqGS:LULU) has introduced Unrestricted Power, a new training platform built around its proprietary PowerLu fabric. The collection is designed for heavy lifts and intensive gym sessions, informed by research and feedback from strength focused athletes. This launch marks an expansion of Lululemon's performance offering into higher intensity strength training apparel. Lululemon enters this launch with its shares at $180.62 and a mixed recent track record, including a...
